TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit GroupCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
type GroupCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 返回一次匹配中捕获的组的集。

span.span: Returns the set of captured groups in a single match.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个从零开始的集合类，包含一个或多个提供有关的信息的对象已捕获的组中的正则表达式匹配。The class is a zero-based collection class that consists of one or more objects that provide information about captured groups in a regular expression match. 集合是固定不变 （只读） 并且没有公共构造函数。The collection is immutable (read-only) and has no public constructor. 一个返回对象属性。A object is returned by the property. 集合包含一个或多个对象。The collection contains one or more objects. 如果匹配成功，则集合中的第一个元素包含对应于整个匹配项的对象。If the match is successful, the first element in the collection contains the object that corresponds to the entire match. 每个后续元素表示一个捕获的组，如果正则表达式中包含捕获组。Each subsequent element represents a captured group, if the regular expression includes capturing groups. 显示匹配项从编号 （未命名） 的捕获组匹配项前的数字顺序从命名的捕获组。Matches from numbered (unnamed) capturing groups appear in numeric order before matches from named capturing groups. 如果匹配不成功，该集合包含单个对象，其属性是`false`并且其属性等于。If the match is unsuccessful, the collection contains a single object whose property is `false` and whose property equals . 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"分组构造和正则表达式对象"一节[的分组构造](~/docs/standard/base-types/grouping-constructs-in-regular-expressions.md)一文。For more information, see the "Grouping Constructs and Regular Expression Objects" section in the [Grouping Constructs](~/docs/standard/base-types/grouping-constructs-in-regular-expressions.md) article. 若要循环访问集合的成员，应使用由你的语言提供的集合迭代构造 (如`foreach`C# 中和`For Each`...`Next`To iterate through the members of the collection, you should use the collection iteration construct provided by your language (such as `foreach` in C# and `For Each`…`Next` 在 Visual Basic 中) 而不是检索枚举器返回的方法。in Visual Basic) instead of retrieving the enumerator that is returned by the method. 此外，您可以访问单个已编号的捕获的组从属性 （索引器在 C# 中），并且您可以访问单个已命名的捕获的组从属性。In addition, you can access individual numbered captured groups from the property (the indexer in C#), and you can access individual named captured groups from the property. 请注意，可以检索通过调用包含数字和名称的所有捕获组的数组和方法，分别。Note that you can retrieve an array that contains the numbers and names of all capturing groups by calling the and methods, respectively. 两者是实例方法，需要您实例化对象，表示要匹配的正则表达式。Both are instance methods and require that you instantiate a object that represents the regular expression to be matched. ## Examples 下面的示例使用正则表达式捕获组来提取有关商标和文本中使用的注册的商标信息。The following example uses a regular expression with capturing groups to extract information about trademarks and registered trademarks used in text. 正则表达式模式是`\b(\w+?)([\u00AE\u2122])`，这解释为下表中所示。The regular expression pattern is `\b(\w+?)([\u00AE\u2122])`, which is interpreted as shown in the following table. |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`\b`|查找字边界。Look for a word boundary.| |`(\w+?)`|查找一个或多个单词字符。Look for one or more word characters. 它们共同构成了商标的名称。Together, these form the trademarked name. （请注意，此正则表达式会假定商标包含单独的词。）这是第一个捕获组。(Note that this regular expression assumes that a trademark consists of a single word.) This is the first capturing group.| |`([\u00AE\u2122])`|查找® 或™ 字符。Look for either the ® or the ™ character. 这是第二个捕获组。This is the second capturing group.| 对于每个匹配项，包含三种对象。For each match, the contains three objects. 第一个对象包含与整个正则表达式匹配的字符串。The first object contains the string that matches the entire regular expression. 第二个对象，表示第一个捕获的组，该对象包含产品名称。The second object, which represents the first captured group, contains the product name. 第三个对象，表示第二个捕获的组，该对象包含商标或注册商标符号。The third object, which represents the second captured group, contains the trademark or registered trademark symbol. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.GroupCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.GroupCollection/cs/Example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.GroupCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.GroupCollection/vb/Example1.vb#1)]

abstract member CopyTo : Array * int -> unit override this.CopyTo : Array * int -> unit

param.name: array
param.span: 要将集合复制到其中的数组。

span.span: The array the collection is to be copied into.

param.name: arrayIndex
param.span: 目标数组中开始复制的位置。

span.span: The position in the destination array where the copying is to begin.

summary.span: 将集合的所有元素复制到给定数组中（从给定索引处开始）。

span.span: Copies all the elements of the collection to the given array beginning at the given index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于整个集合复制到给定索引处开始的数组，目标数组必须至少与集合一样大。Because the entire collection is copied into the array starting at the given index, the destination array must be at least as large as the collection. > [!WARNING] > 此成员中不存在[!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]。This member is not present in the [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]. 如果你正在开发的应用程序面向[!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]，使用方法相反。If you are developing applications that target the [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)], use the method instead. ## Examples 下面的示例从句子中提取每个单词，并在捕获组捕获方法则用于每个匹配项中的元素复制对象数组，其中包含捕获组从所有匹配项。The following example extracts each word from a sentence and captures it in a capturing group, The method is then used to copy the elements in each match's object to an array that contains the capturing groups from all matches. 然后向控制台显示捕获的各个单词。The individual captured words are then displayed to the console. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.GroupCollection.CopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.groupcollection.copyto/cs/copyto1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.GroupCollection.CopyTo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.groupcollection.copyto/vb/copyto1.vb#1)] 正则表达式定义，如下所示：The regular expression is defined as follows: |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`\b`|与字边界匹配。Match a word boundary.| |`(\S+?)`|匹配一个或多个非空白字符。Match one or more non-white space characters. 将其分配给第一个捕获组。Assign them to the first capturing group.| |`\b`|与字边界匹配。Match a word boundary.|

is outside the bounds of .

exception.span: 以及 在 的界限外。

span.span: Returns the number of groups in the collection.
The number of groups in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象始终有至少一个成员。The object always has at least one member. 如果某一匹配不成功，属性返回对象，其中包含单个成员。If a match is unsuccessful, the property returns a object that contains a single member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 而不是调用方法来检索枚举器，可用于循环访问对象在集合中，应使用组迭代构造 (如`foreach`在 C# 和`For Each`...`Next`Instead of calling the method to retrieve an enumerator that lets you iterate through the objects in the collection, you should use the group iteration construct (such as `foreach` in C# and `For Each`…`Next` 在 Visual Basic 中) 是由您的编程语言提供。in Visual Basic) that is provided by your programming language.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!WARNING] > 此成员中不存在[!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]。This member is not present in the [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]. 如果你正在开发的应用程序面向[!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]，使用属性改为。If you are developing applications that target the [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)], use the property instead.

param.name: groupnum
param.span: 要检索的集合成员的索引（从零开始）。

span.span: The zero-based index of the collection member to be retrieved.

summary.span: 允许通过整数索引访问集合成员。

span.span: Enables access to a member of the collection by integer index.

value.span: 由 指定的集合的成员。

span.span: The member of the collection specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性为 （在 C# 中) 的索引或默认属性 （在 Visual Basic 中) 的类。The property is the index (in C#) or the default property (in Visual Basic) of the class. 它使您能够通过使用枚举集合的成员`foreach`C# 中的语句或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中的语句。It allows you to enumerate the members of the collection by using a `foreach` statement in C# or a `For Each` statement in Visual Basic. 此属性还可用于按其索引号检索单个捕获的组。You can also use this property to retrieve individual captured groups by their index number. 您可以检索通过调用该实例包含的正则表达式中的所有捕获组号的数组方法。You can retrieve an array that contains the numbers of all capturing groups in a regular expression by calling the instance method. 您还可以将命名的捕获组通过调用实例映射到其数字方法。You can also map named capturing groups to their numbers by calling the instance method. 可以通过检索的值来确定集合中的项数属性。You can determine the number of items in the collection by retrieving the value of the property. 有效值为`groupnum`参数范围从 0 到集合中的项数减一。Valid values for the `groupnum` parameter range from 0 to one less than the number of items in the collection. 返回对象属性始终具有至少一个成员。The object returned by the property always has at least one member. 如果正则表达式引擎找不到任何匹配项，在特定输入字符串中，单个集合中的对象都有其属性设置为`false`并将其`Group.Value`属性设置为。If the regular expression engine cannot find any matches in a particular input string, the single object in the collection has its property set to `false` and its `Group.Value` property set to . 如果`groupnum`不是索引的集合的成员，或者如果`groupnum`是不匹配输入字符串中该方法返回的捕获组的索引对象，其属性是`false`和其`Group.Value`属性是。If `groupnum` is not the index of a member of the collection, or if `groupnum` is the index of a capturing group that has not been matched in the input string, the method returns a object whose property is `false` and whose `Group.Value` property is . ## Examples 下面的示例定义两个带编号的组组成的正则表达式。The following example defines a regular expression that consists of two numbered groups. 第一个组捕获一个或多个连续的数字。The first group captures one or more consecutive digits. 第二个组匹配单个字符。The second group matches a single character. 正则表达式引擎查找第一个组的零个或一个匹配项，因为它不会始终找到匹配即使正则表达式匹配成功。Because the regular expression engine looks for zero or one occurrence of the first group, it does not always find a match even if the regular expression match is successful. 该示例然后说明了结果时属性用于检索不匹配的组、 匹配的组和正则表达式中未定义的组。The example then illustrates the result when the property is used to retrieve an unmatched group, a matched group, and a group that is not defined in the regular expression. 该示例定义正则表达式模式`(\d+)*(\w)\2`，这解释为下表中所示。The example defines a regular expression pattern `(\d+)*(\w)\2`, which is interpreted as shown in the following table. |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`(\d+)*`|匹配一个或多个匹配项的一个十进制数字。Match one or more occurrence of a decimal digit. 这是第一个捕获组。This is the first capturing group. 与此模式匹配零个或一个时间。Match this pattern either zero or one time.| |`(\w)`|这是第二个捕获组。This is the second capturing group.| |`\k`|第二个捕获组捕获的字符串匹配。Match the string captured by the second capturing group.| [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.GroupCollection.Item#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.groupcollection.item/cs/item3.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.GroupCollection.Item#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.groupcollection.item/vb/item3.vb#2)]

span.span: Grouping Constructs

MemberSignature.Value: Default Public ReadOnly Property Item(groupname As String) As Group
public: property System::Text::RegularExpressions::Group ^ default[System::String ^] { System::Text::RegularExpressions::Group ^ get(System::String ^ groupname); };

span.span: The name of a capturing group.

summary.span: 允许通过字符串索引访问集合成员。

span.span: Enables access to a member of the collection by string index.

value.span: 由 指定的集合的成员。

span.span: The member of the collection specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `groupName` 可通过定义的捕获组名称`(?<`*名称*`>)`正则表达式或由一组定义的捕获组数字的字符串表示形式中的元素构造。`groupName` can be either the name of a capturing group that is defined by the `(?<`*name*`>)` element in a regular expression, or the string representation of the number of a capturing group that is defined by a grouping construct. 有关正则表达式中的组的详细信息，请参阅[的分组构造](~/docs/standard/base-types/grouping-constructs-in-regular-expressions.md)。For more information about groups in regular expressions, see [Grouping Constructs](~/docs/standard/base-types/grouping-constructs-in-regular-expressions.md). 您可以检索中的所有捕获组的名称对象通过调用方法。You can retrieve the names of all the captured groups in a object by calling the method. 您还可以映射通过调用捕获它们的名称的正则表达式中的组的数字方法。You can also map the numbers of capturing groups in a regular expression to their names by calling the method. 然后可以将数组中的各个名称传递给属性来检索捕获的字符串。Individual names from the array can then be passed to the property to retrieve the captured string. 如果`groupname`不是集合中的捕获组的名称或如果`groupname`不匹配输入字符串中该方法返回的捕获组的名称对象，其属性是`false`并且其`Group.Value`属性是。If `groupname` is not the name of a capturing group in the collection, or if `groupname` is the name of a capturing group that has not been matched in the input string, the method returns a object whose property is `false` and whose `Group.Value` property is . ## Examples 下面的示例定义两个命名组所组成的正则表达式。The following example defines a regular expression that consists of two named groups. 第一个组， `numbers`，捕获一个或多个连续的数字。The first group, `numbers`, captures one or more consecutive digits. 第二个组， `letter`，单个字符匹配。The second group, `letter`, matches a single character. 因为正则表达式引擎将查找定义的模式的零个或一个匹配项`numbers`组中，`numbers`组并不总是存在即使匹配成功。Because the regular expression engine looks for zero or one occurrence of the pattern defined by the `numbers` group, the `numbers` group is not always present even if a match is successful. 该示例然后说明了结果时属性用于检索不匹配的组、 匹配的组和正则表达式中未定义的组。The example then illustrates the result when the property is used to retrieve an unmatched group, a matched group, and a group that is not defined in the regular expression. 该示例定义正则表达式模式`(?\d+)*(?\w)\k`，这解释为下表中所示。The example defines a regular expression pattern `(?\d+)*(?\w)\k`, which is interpreted as shown in the following table. |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`(?\d+)*`|匹配一个或多个匹配项的一个十进制数字。Match one or more occurrence of a decimal digit. 命名此`numbers`捕获组。Name this the `numbers` capturing group. 与此模式匹配零个或一个时间。Match this pattern either zero or one time.| |`(?\w)`|匹配单个单词字符。Match a single word character. 命名此`letter`捕获组。Name this the `letter` capturing group.| |`\k`|匹配由捕获的字符串`letter`捕获组。Match the string captured by the `letter` capturing group.| [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.GroupCollection.Item#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.groupcollection.item/cs/item2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.GroupCollection.Item#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.groupcollection.item/vb/item2.vb#1)]
